動物用藥品名稱: 普豬威豬丹毒、小病毒不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣英特威動物藥品股份有限公司
地址: WIM DE KORVERSTRAAT 35, 5831 AN BOXMEER, THE NETHERLAND
效能(適應症): 預防豬丹毒及豬小病毒感染。
ingredients: ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: INACTIVED PORCINE PARVOVIRUS STRAIN014 360.4MG(INDUCING>=9 LOG2 HI UNITS); INACTIVATED (LYSED). E. RHUSIOPATHIAESTRAIN M2 ≧1RPU（RELATIVE POTENCY UNIT）; INACTIVE INGREDIENTS  ALPHA-TOCOPHEROL ACETATE 150MG; POLYSORBATE 80 60MG; TRIS(HYDROXYMETHYL)AMINOMETHANE 1.22MG; SODIUM CHLORIDE 12.0MG; FORMALIN 2.7MG;SIMETICONE 0.1MG; WATER FOR INJECTIONS TO 2ML.
